sourcesContent:
TechStore

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Product,products } from '../products'; import { CartService } from '../cart.service'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { LikeServiceService } from '../like-service.service'; import { ProductListComponent } from '../product-list/product-list.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ product : Product |undefined; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private cartService: CartService, ) {} ngOnInit(){ const routeParams = this.route.snapshot.paramMap; const productIdFromRoute = Number(routeParams.get('productCategorie')); } }
